title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Mezzaro in a multicolored design on a white ground.  Formed of three panels stitched together. Large-scale tree with a border of alternating bunches of fruit and vases with flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-66-128.
